useCase.name: Manage Accruals
useCase.description: Allow donor representatives to manage accruals by supplying files and metadata to the digital archive system.

preconditions.precondition: The donor representative is authenticated and logged in to the system.

successEndConditions.condition: Accrual is successfully added to the archive with unique identifiers for new files generated.

useCase.trigger: User selects "Supply Accruals" option from the dashboard.

mainSequence.step: Authenticate and log in the donor representative.
Display donor dashboard with available options.
Select "Supply Accruals" option from the dashboard.
Display form to select a collection or create a new one.
Fill the form with accrual details and select an existing collection.
Confirm the selected collection to supply accruals.
Upload files and metadata for accrual.
Record accrual in the database and generate unique identifiers for new files.
Display success message indicating "Accrual added successfully".
